ingredientsDesc:
1.	Microwell Strips: Purified HSV 1 antigen coated wells.

7.	Cut-off Calibrator: Yellow Cap.  100 EU/ml
8.	Positive Calibrator: Red Cap.   200 EU/ml
9.	Stop Solution: 2N HCl.	(12×8 wells)
